text: 2.11 Sng 72.10, Ais 60.6, Mat 12.46 Pen kal mɨgan ayaŋ amɨl nɨgɨlak, ñɨ ak nonɨm Maliya ayɨp yelek. Nɨŋɨd, apyap kɨgom yɨmɨl yɨb nop dad aplanɨlak. Yɨb nop dad aplanɨl, wad kɨli okok aŋɨlɨl, tap teplep yɨbɨl okok nop ñɨlak. Gol ogɨnap sek, wel kuy tep owep ogɨnap sek, mab mok kuy tep owep ogɨnap sek nop ñɨlak.
